licence.p: This work is licenced under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

objectDesc.p: Leiden University Library Or 9610: a transcript in Latin script made based on palm-leave manuscript Kirtya No. IIIc. 1071. This transcript was made by Gusti Nyoman Ngurah Prongot in 3 September 1941, and checked by I Ketut Badung. Photographed by Zakariya Pamuji Aminullah in 2019.

projectDesc.p: This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

revisionDesc.change: Initial encoding of the edition (first folia)

div.ab:
1
oṅ avignam astu,
avarah tridasa proktaḥ, srivanah vivuda surah, vr̥dirakah
aditeja, dajvarah danavadvitsah.lekah sarvasino s
vapnah, trivesah sudasinah, deva svargasado mityah, r̥buva
mr̥tavah tata. aditeyah sumanasah, suparvano dito sakasah, de
vatas tu triyah muktah, sandeva vani sruhatah.
amarah tridasa, sinava, vivudha, surah, vradakara, adite
ja, danavadita, loka, sarvasina, asvapna, tridivesah, suda
sina, deva svarga, sada, amartya, r̥bu, amr̥tapa, aditeya, su
manasa, suparva, divosaka, devata, ṅa. devata ika. siva sarva vi
rupaksa, mahadeva mahisvarah, srikandah saṅkaro ganah, somavra
ka nilalohikah. kapidik cata vasas ca, rudra gaṅga
dara harah,
krasanuretah kamirah, panartih vr̥saketanah. durjati tryamba
rah bimah, sarva ajña giriso mr̥dah, ugra pasupati sulih, ba
madeva ganadipah. isah isvarah isana, kapali pamesvarah, sivi
pisto vyomas kesah, tripurarih dilocanah. oṅkaraya namah s
vaha. aran batara isvara, giva, sarva, virupaksa, mahadeva, mahe
svara, srikanta, saṅkara, garba, soma, vraka, nilalohita, kamadi,
krativasa, rudra, gaṅgadara, hara, krasanu
rota, kamarih, vrasaketana, pinaki, durjadi, tryambara, bima,
sarvajña, girisa, mrada, ugre, nandakavaha, pasupati, suli,
bamadeva, ganadipa, isa, isana, isvara, kapali, paramesvara, byo
makesa, tripurari, trilocana, vr̥sabadvaja, kr̥tr̥, samba,
sarva bava, stanu, sula, br̥tya, sokamala sacah.
oṅkara namah brah
ma, srasda, atmabuh, data, paramesdi, pitama
ha, hiranya, garba arva vidi, viriñci, caturmukha, lokesa, vi
svasrak, vedah, suranyasdah, prajapati, vidata, padmayoni,
svambuh, kamalalocana, kr̥tavarsa,, sivi, bahni, viba, vasu,
sarvabut, hutataha, mataramuka, vahana, varagəni, jataveda,
dumaketu, vroja, hutabuk, kamala, bava, hutagana, anala, lo
hitasva, sorathi, visvanara, asdaca, saptaparca, rasraya hi
madaha, jusaksani, hiranareka, jvalana, saṅ uda, kr̥panu,
tanunapat, vihiraksa, titihotre, danañcaya, krapyahyani, manda
dahana, ramuni, habyasana, marutabaka, aṅsavatana, ṅa. batara brahma ika.
2
brahmani, baga giva, livasa, veda, vidyayamabrat, dara, imu, kavista,
tripurantaka, kandakavahana, si anda
karipu, pramesti, kamalada
hana, berava, lokesvara, pradesada, jivatma, pitambara, mani,
jagatnata, nilakanta, oṅkara namah, ṅa. baṅkara namah, ṅa.
batara guru ika.
paramesvari, bagani, beravi, caṅgi, daṅgih, rudrasih,
sarvani, skandamiti, adrija, saparni, gori, keri, parvati,
mahisavahana, durga, geṅgi, rodri, vahini, mahisi, mani, ganda
ri, rohini, padmi, kundi, mandri, krodi, bagavati, vidali, mar
di, ṅa. batari uma ika.
brahmasrapdah, tvabudatah, parametdi pitamaha, hiranya
gabor ta vidih, viriñcih sya caturmukah.
lokesu visresreska vedah, suradyasdah prajapatih, vidata
padmayonis ca, svayambuh ja. batari, dani, sastravit, sude
vi, dari, kumari, gaṅgadari, prajña, nari, tatvavit, vaji,
mandari, vilasini, sastradara, ṅa. batara svati ika.
visnu narayana
sorih, cakrapani janardanah, padmana
bo r̥sikesah, vekunda visdarasravah. indravaraja upendrah,
govindo garudadvajah, kesava punadarikaksa, kr̥sna pitam
baro cyata. visvaksenah svabuh saṅgi, danavari adoksa
jah, vr̥kapih dasudevah, madave madusudanah.
oṅkara namah, ṅa. batara visnu, nrayana, gori, cakra
pani, janardana, padmanaba, r̥sikesa, vekunda, visdarasrava,
indravaraja, upendra, govinda, garudadvaja, pundariksa,
kr̥sna, pitambara, acruta, visvaksena, svasuh,
aduksaja, vrasikapi, basudeva, madadva, madusudana, rama
badra, garudavahana, kapidvaja, basra, dara, kariṅi, hari,
kesava, gori, pundarika, goraja, vesnava, ahatpajanadana, vida
sena, sarsi, detyaripu, srida, rana, damodana, sañjaya, a
d
vama ja, kapraksakapi, bamana, trivikrama, kayarudra, detyad
vipa, tripita, praṅlada, sripati, pravahumna, aniruda, sitara
ta, citarata, sukeka, ari, ṅa. batara visnu ika.
sri, haripriya, padmavasa, padma nari, kamali, laksmi buk
ti, laksmi, danapati, ratnadari, ṅa. batari sri ika.
indra viloja valabit, puruhutah purunmurah, vrada
srava sanasinah, vr̥treha pakasasanah.
saṅkrandada syavanah, sutamah kandalah vr̥sa, marut
vi vasavah vahkrah, aditya, savita, vrada, sura, surya divaṅgara,
visvakarma, sahasraṅsu, tarani, tavana, ravi, vetaṅkana, ha
ridasva, saptasapti, ṅuna, aryama, upaṅaṅsu, aṅsuman,
3
pusa, divasvan, baskara uparakta, aruna, dinaṅkara, aditi,
dadisu, svavahana, ṅ ve, ṅa. saṅ hyaṅ aditya ika.
kunaṅ yan suryagrahana, somaplava ṅaranya.
vesvaba
runa lo bahni, rohitaso hutasanah, saptadir usra
yasa gnih, dahanañ casuksuksanih. hiranyaretah jvalanah, pavaka
syad uvadah, krasanuh krasnavartas ca, jatavedah tanukapat.
havibuh tosrahadrunah, citri otra dananjayah, kupitayoni da
numan, havyadaha marutsakah. vesvanira, anala, bahni, rohata
sva, hutasana, saptarci, asrayasa, agni, dahana susuksani,
hiranyace, hasrakra satakratuh. pasopatih loksanah, hayaso maga
van tarih, tusarata sotrabita bajri, r̥buksa si divaspatih.
indra, vipoja, valabit, puruhuta, purandara, vr̥dasrava, sa
nasika, vratraha, pakasasana, sakradana, dyasyavana, satama, a
kandaya, vrasa, parutvan, vasana, sakra, satakr̥tu, vasopati,
lekaspar
sa, haryasva, magavan, harih, tusarata, gotribitya, bajri,
r̥buksa, divaspati, ṅa. saṅ hyaṅ indra ika.
adityah savita vr̥dah, surah surya divakara, dinakrat
himiro bosvan, martanda ka prabaṅkara.
visvakarma sagraṅku, karanih hapano ravih, vekartano ha
ridasvah, sastasasti anaryi yamam. upbaṅ suhaṅ gumar̥sah,
divasvan castu baskarah, umarakto ravicandrah, sadṅih so
maplato matah. satya siṅgo ca latamah. samantadadrah sagatah, dar
maraja vinayakah, sarva asida bagavan, trikaleñjo sa sarajita.
buda, jina, dasabala, munindra, tatagata, madarijña,
sahyasiṅa, gotama, samantabadra, sugata, darmadara, atmadara,
pretamasa, daksinasva, papa tatparna, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ buda ika.
halabadro hala
ramah, kamayalo halayudah, kakarsanah pralambagə
nah, baladevo citagrajah. musali talalaksmañ ca, nilambaro
hineyah, revatiramanah ñalah, siranis cah laṅgyali.
balabadra, hali, rama, kamapala, halayudda, kakarsana, pralam
bagna, baladeva, acyatagraja, musali, talaksma, bilambara, ro
hini, laṅgalyapi, ṅa. baladeva ika.
manusyadharma danadah, kuvera navahanah, rata, jvala
na, pavaka, ursahuda, krasanu krasnavarta, javaveda, tanunap
, havibubut, vrahadrunu, citihetre, dhanajaya, kupivayoni, da
numan, vyavaha, marut, saka, ṅaraniṅ apuyi, ika.
pavana svasana, bamaruyuh ramanomara dasugah, ma
tarisvanilo vatah, samiras ca samiranah. nabasvan ga
ndavahas ca,
vr̥sadasvah prabañcanah, sapasanah pavamanas ca, tatah prabah
sadagatih.
pavana, svasana, bayu maruta, asuga, matarisva, ani
4
la, vata, samirana, narasvan, gandavaha, vramajasva, prabañ
cana, pavamana, prana, sadagati, aṅin, asvasan, maruta, ji
vantaka, jivambara, mr̥taṅga, svadamani, vyañjana, ṅa, saṅ
hyaṅ bayu ika.
budo jino sadabalah, munindras ca tagatah, satabijṅas
ru sarvajñah, ṅa. saṅ hyaṅ kamadeva ika.
indra candro nisanateh, sitaṅsu sasalañcanah, mragaṅ
gah candramah somah, vidhu tarapatih sasih.
osadiso himaṅsu pa, upepe ndo nisakara, candrakav ekava
kyaca, puspavente prakititah.
indra candra, nisanasa, sataṅsu, sasa lañcana, mrataṅ
ga, candrama, soma, vidu, tarapati, sasi, osadipa, himaravi, si
giraṅga, timirat
sitarasmi, ama, sitaṅsu, avuntru, sasada
ra, udipa, sitakara, indu, graharana, sasaṅka, mr̥gaṅsu dikcaya,
sisa uṅkukan, ṅa. saṅ hyaṅ ulan, ika. candrakav ekyasa, vas
patano prakiṅtitah. kunaṅ yan paṅekakala saṅ hyaṅ ulan,
mvaṅ saṅ yaṅ aditya, paspata ṅa.nya.
naktañcarah anyajanah, kavyadah raksanadacarah, raksasa ne
kaseyas ca, traulavilva vesravanah, rajaraja ta yaksarad.
utarasapatih sridah, yolastya guhyakadipa, yaksapunya, jane
sa, niraresuvara, yaguh kuvadrapa, amarana, harya, ginarendra,
guhyaka, jambulaṅ, manibadra, purnamendra, ratnadata, maha
dahni, naradahana, alavila, dravipati, yaksadipa, punyajanepa,
tabesa, ṅa. batara vesravana.
madahda padmato mara, kardave darsakah smarah, pradyumna nyajo
nayah, si
tayonih manobavah. ucayoṅ sa suketus ca, pañcamuh
kusumayudah, brahmasurih sakdetuñ ca, aniruda upapatih.
madana, manmata, mara, kadarpa, darpaka, smara, pradyumna, adany
aja, anaṅga, citayoni, manobava, erascaya, sukatu, pañcamu
, kusumayuda, brahmasuri, saketu, adiruda, usapati, ṅa. vi.
sudi, surapa, matiman, sankyapan, pandita, uda, praptarupa,
krati, prajña, dosajña, krato, mr̥du, santa, santya, satvi
ka, yata, nibrata, yativara, munindra, dyaya, diyi, satatma, kra
panu, kasali, darmasu, darmatma, vakta, vascita, jñavat, sra
mana, citajña, muniti, pipañcit, prano, pandya, munisvara, yogi,
dharmajña, viku, r̥si, biksuka, bujaṅga, kalyanadarma, ṅa.
saṅ hyaṅ pandita ika.
dvisan dasyu sapatni rah, vipaksaritisatravah, paripantyahitami
trah, ripudvesanaveri
neh.
pratipaksa bisa, tiduvit, jigaṅsu jurhrnado samah, drataksa
durkitavah, dyutakaraksadinah. dvisan, dasya, sapatna, ari,
5
vipaksa, ariti, satru, paripanti, atita, ripu, dvesana, ve
ri, pratipaksa, dvita, jigaṅsu, asama, ṅa. vyanetratatona
pah.
yatudanañ ca vyakatih, klide dve saturaksasih, r̥sayah sap
tadivadṅih, citramutahsikandinah.
nakjañcarah adajana, kravyada, anya, ksanadacara, raksasa,
nekaseyah, trava, nedraha, konapa, yatudana, kunan ikaṅ yatuh
mvaṅ raksasa, napuṅsakaliṅsa ika, ṅa. raksasa ika.
r̥sayah sapta dipadsih, smutah, citrasikandih. mavalena kunan,
ya saṅ saptar̥si, citrasikanda ṅaranya, liṅ saṅ mahapurusa.
diro dirupo surih san, vidvan diman, vinaksanah, labdavarno
manisañ ca, tə
vadu kavih.
sudih surupo timan, saṅkyavan pandita vr̥dah, praṅguru pah
krati, krasdih, pañca dosajña eva ca.
adira, abirupa, suri, sana, vidvan, diman, vicaksana, labda
varna, maniti, vuvapañcyat, kaviduh, kabagañ ceva, krimibut
ceva jihmanah.
bujaṅga, bujaga, sarpa, dandaka, bujaṅgama, asivisa dara,
pradaku, svasanasana, kakodarah, caksusrava, uraga, gupa
pat, jali, sarisr̥pa, bogi punyaga, darvikara, mandalika, vyala,
vyada, kundali, viliyah, dvidasana, krimibuta, jihmaga, sar
padipa, dasra, kaga, baṅga, krapibut, usa teksaka, matrajiva,
rodra, ahi, basuki pani, tadratanaya, anipi, ṅa. ula ika.
gugo visako kreñcarih, saktibrat vartipavahah, genanih sara skandah,
kumarah sanmuko gənibreh.
gana,
visaka, kroñcarih, saktibr̥t, vartivaha, sanajih, sara
jah, skanda, sanmukha, agni, brah, ṅa. saṅ kumbara ika.
protadipah pitrapatih, kinasah samano kajah, vepasvatah samavitih,
darmaraja musuh ika, 19.
kunan ika, duvitaksa, durta, dyutakara, aksajiva, ṅa. ba
botoh ika.
pataṅgah patatah paksih, patrarato da nidajah, patri patatri saku
ni, sakuntah salaba tan.
vihaṅgo vihaṅgah vaji, vihas cah vihaṅgamah, vistiro vikiro vis
cah, nagotah syan anekajah.
pataṅga, pataga, paksi, patrerata, danidaja, patri, sakuni, sa
kunta, vihaṅga, vihaga, vaji, vihaya, vihaṅgama, vistara, vi
kara, vi. nagota, nekata, kədis, ṅa. manuk kabeh ika.
bujaṅgo bujaṅgah sarpah, dandasuko bujaṅgamah, agivis
yo visadarah, pradakuh svasanasanah.
kakodarah caksusravah, urago pupali, sarisrapa dvijihnasu va,
6
mato bogis ca panagah.
darvikara mandakah, vyalo vyadas ca kundali, viloya dibunata,
bupati, bubrat, bupala, adisvara, nr̥pati, naresvara, naranata,
narendra, patarnana, narapati, yanasa, maharaja, nrapa, bupala
ka, pati, bramali, agani, sundari, anina, maranari, kramari bagi,
ṅa. ratu ika.
manusya manusya matyan, manusan manavañ caran, purun pu
rusa nr̥pas ca, pañcajananya smarana vindu. manusya, mana
sya, mat manuja, manava, nara, purusa, dr̥sca, na. jana
jadma, voṅ, tahu, jantu, uraṅ, ṅa. vaṅ ika. suta ksan
ta nihantas ca, stipasarvesmaheva ca prajita daksinasuvan ca,
sadi saravir ucyate. suta, santa, niyanta, astipa, sarvasta,
prajita, daksinabasma, ṅa. sariti ika.
putras tu tanayah sunuh, santu
nas ca satmajanta, sutuh
stripriyam sutih tanujah, kopatyas ca napusake. putra,
tanaya, sunu, yamantukah.
pratadipa, pitrapati, kinasa, sano kaja, evasvata, samavirti,
darmaraja, antaka, ṅa, baṭara yama ika.
asurah danujah detyu, purvadevah suvaradvisah, ditijah
canavas cevah, dokeyah danusudanah. asura, danuja, dety
a, paṅuvadeva, suradvisa, ditija, danava, deteya, danu
sudana, ṅa. detya ika.
vraspati suradarya, sipatih disalo guruh, vahaspati aṅgiras ca, jvah citrasikandinah.
vraspati, suracarya, sipati, dimana, guru, vahaspati, aṅ
giri, jiva, sikandika, ṅa. bagavan vraspati ika.
raja rat partovo bukpit, ina ksanbrat naradipa, bunato bupa
tih bubrat, bupalo dasvaro drapah.
raṅa rat, pativa, ina ksmabrat, buksit, naradipa, bunata, bu
yo, sva cacavr̥ka, ṅa mavala ika.
bramara satpado braṅgah, puspalit silimukas cah, diroka li ma
hadukarah, dvirarupa madubrata. brahmara, sadpada, puspa
lit, silimuka, diramuka, madukara, dvirarupa, madubrata,
madu pa, kumbaṅ, tambuliliṅan, ṅa. tavon ika.
kadgah kr̥pano nistriṅguh, narapalas ru sayakah, r̥sti ca man
dalagra sat, asih nokseya tatah.
kadga, kr̥pana, nistriṅsa, karapala, sayaka, r̥sta, mandalagra,
asih, kokseya, ṅa. gadga paksi ika.
isu vastri prasaṅkas ca, bano ta margano rapaḥ, kanda sajitma
ga madi. isu, prasaṅka, kalamba, visaka, sara, bana, margaha,
7
rova, kandala, jihmaga, sulamuka, saka, sravara, varayaṅ,
saya, santana, atma
raja, suta, apatya, pranu, tunuru, vəka,
kosa, karija, tosi, tanuja, vahu, prajana, ṅa. pyanak ika.
coro malimlus dasyuh, taskara pratiro dakah, vatimosi paras
kandi, suvekegorikah tatah.
corah, malimloca, dasyu, taskara, pratimosa, paraskandi,
stena, kagorika, sasyu, kukarya, tasyu, malina, vike, tri
gari, kambaloh, aboyah, mandarka, laṅkira, godana, danahari, pan
duṅ, ṅa. maliṅ, ika.
prakr̥ta, pomano nica, krukalah procyate kalah, avidvani va
kr̥tas ca, nikr̥smo pr̥sañcanah.
pamana, kasulakah, laka, avidvan, avakkrasta, kalana, kalana, ṅa. vaṅ
nista ika.
kurah, sarameyas ca, sca ca salavr̥ko makah.
koleyakah, mragadaṅsu, basaka, sunata, kuṅkara, saramora,
anapati, vignantaka, vinayaka, pramoda, stimuka, berava,
vagraha, danañjaya, ṅa. batara gana ika.
sasabrat, pasipr̥ceta, yadapati, dularat, pasamr̥ta, gout,
yambaha, pr̥keta, praharoda, minadipa, matsyadara, yanorarat, pra
koti, mragaya, jaladi, patimbara, ṅa. saṅ hyaṅ baruna ika.
usanah, bagavah kavah, detyaguru, bragu, ṅa. bagavan sukra ika.
svargahbuh, vasah, sahikeyah, ṅa. kalaravu ika.
kuja, lohitaṅsu, bumija, ṅa aṅgara ika.
vipraṅ, aṅryajana, dvijati, dvija, deta, vara, ñayaj
ñopa, jivana, vedavi, camino, dandi, vadakuva, kavaya, su
ci, daṅ hyaṅ, ṅa. saṅ brahmana ika.
varatri darani ksoni, ksiti visvambara stira, urvi kuh prati
vi pr̥ti, medini jya vasundaraka. astra, kandah, vajib, nara
vara, sapaṅga, cakra, ṅa. sañjata həru ika.
upasaṅgas ca banadih,
saradis capi tunistri, isudih vastri
yam bavet.
turna, kənisaṅka, tunira, upasaṅga, banadi, isudi, ṅa. taṅkulak ika.
saras koṅdanda, kamurka, capa, daṅsa, danuh, danur, vadaṅ
ka, ayuda, danuven, sarasana, gande, pamabah, ṅa. laras ika.
r̥sih, r̥ksah, cakra, bajra, vejendra, tomara, limpuṅ, ma
sanda, parasvada, tuhhuka, konta, prata, ugra, mugari, mu
sala, basama, venesa, təvək, pandita, manala, gayuṅ, trisula,
badama, utprana, jantra lapaka, gandi, danda, gada parasu,
nagasavah, ṅa. sañjata anduk ika.
8
hiramba, vigəna, nara, darvinaya, durmuka, sumukañcadaya,
dvitisa, akaja, gaṅgesvada, madarika, indivara, nilotpa
la, arivida, kunila, ṅa. tuñjuṅ ika.
tuva, andupana, vasara, vyasta, kr̥maya, upa, ṅa. sumbar ika.
vartani, prajana, sana senu, calada, ca sami rujan, sahaya, br̥t
ya, ṅa. vadva.
rosa, vuyuṅ, arah kaja, mana, dirgaja, oka, moha kroda, vis
vadi, koma, ṅa. gələṅ ika.
ganita, kala, saya, kagasa, dandala, canda, r̥kta, tr̥sa, kalma
sa, preta, naraka, daraka, samala, codyama, ninya, nisaya, na
tana, proktah, nahina, avika, avatya, niraya, ṅa. papa ika.
kasani, dari, dustri, pracali, kañcalmi, reni, dusani, dursi
la, sagani, dumuvi, vandani, ṅa. lvir ika.
